EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP: Tampa Bay Lightning vs San Jose Sharks
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're looking forward a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey as the Tampa Bay Lightning take on the San Jose Sharks. Will you join us with Cisco and your technology peers on December 2nd? Tampa Bay Lightning vs San Jose Sharks <[[turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]>
Where: Amalie Arena 401 Channelside Dr., Tampa, FL 33602 Saturday, December 2nd 6:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-tampabay]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
